```{r}
data_frame %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  identify_outliers(joules)

df_outliers <- data_frame %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  identify_outliers(joules)

  anti_join(df_outliers, by = "id")
```

```{r}
kruskal.test(joules ~ dataset, data = data_frame)
```
